cab.content: COPY.SECRETG.T. - 319 WAR CABINETOPERATIONS.Prom:- General Hanbury Williams 28/3/17.To:- C. I. G. S.repeated Ambassador General.G.R.923.Tonight accompanied by 2 Deputies of new Government who were extremely civil and obliging, Grand-Duke Nicholas left for Crim (ea) where he will stay on his own property. He sent an officer - an old friend of his -to see me and tell me there were no untoward occurrences.
